content.body:
everyone whom's't've hath registered already for in-person attendance for the Tokyo plenary this year has been invited, or is in the process of being invited, to the Tokyo 2025 matrix room.

I am getting rate-limited (thanks Matrix!) so the remaining 12 invites should be trickling in eventually

let me, Rob, or Ujjwal know if you still haven't been added by EOD

content.body: What is the deadline for in-person registration? We're still trying to figure out who or if any of us will be able to attend.

Mathieu Hofman and mgaudet:

Rob will respond shortly with a better answer, but FWIW, last time Bloomberg hosted in Tokyo (2023), the requested deadline for in-person registration was ~2 weeks prior to plenary.  It is best for organization purposes to know who is attending as soon as possible, but if there are late registrations we will do our best to accommodate.

Fun fact: a delegate showed up unexpectedly at last year's Tokyo plenary.  They had never completed the in-person registration form.  We worked it out.  ðŸ™‚

content.body: I will definitely know more than 2 weeks prior. (Mostly I am blocked on a postal strike right now due to an unfortunately timed passport renewal)
